sentences.sContent: Light the lantern, take it and go down stairs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Light the lantern, take it and go down stairs.
sentences.sCn: 你把这灯笼点起来，带着它下楼去。

sentences.sContent: What starts as an everyday squash turns into a lantern of light.
sentences.sContent_eng: What starts as an everyday squash turns into a lantern of light.
sentences.sCn: 一个平平常常的南瓜变成了一个充满光亮的灯笼。

sentences.sContent: In the course of time, this kind of lantern has become an exclusive of the Shens.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the course of time, this kind of lantern has become an exclusive of the Shens.
sentences.sCn: 后来， 这种灯笼成了沈家的绝活。

trans.tranOther: a lamp that you can carry, consisting of a metal container with glass sides that surrounds a flame or light
